features: 【PRACTICAL CLEANING ASSISTANT】The 45-degree brushed bevel design of the broom and dustpan can be extended into the sofa, under the bed and under the cabinet ,making it easy to solve difficult sanitary corners.
【HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL】Made of PET material, it is elastic, three rows of bristles, soft and not easy to wear the floor, can easily capture dirt and dust, suitable for all kinds of ground.

【COMB DESIGN AND SILICONE STRIP DESIGN】 The upper end of the dustpan is equipped with long and large scraping teeth. The unique comb function can easily remove dirt and hair from the broom. In addition, the front end of the dustpan has a soft rubber lip and can be used with any floor, creating a strong seal between the floor and the dustpan. No left the dust o debris when the floor is cleaned.

【DETACHEBLE WINDPROOF DUSTPAN】 Large-capacity windproof dustpan don't have to worry about litter falling, not afraid of wind, no dust; The rotating joint design of handle for dustpan is easy to lift, stand and store. Portable snap-on design, detachable pole, hand-held, suitable for cleaning fine dust particles on the tabletop.

【2 in 1 STORAGE, SAVE SPACE】 The top of the broom can be hung and stored. In addition, simply clip the broom to the handle of dustpan, folded and stored in the gap between the refrigerator and the washing machine. It is neat and beautiful and does not occupy space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the bristle cleaner teeth on the dustpan!!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this dust pan broom set. I have always hated picking the dog hair off the broom. The comb usually gets most of it off without you is being to touch it. So yayyyy less nasty. Only con, the broom handle is a little too lightweight/kinda flimsy. But I still say it’s worth the broom comb. I have bought 2 of them bc I like them so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: What can I say? It's a broom and dustpan. Gets the job done. I like the color and the dust pan. I like that I can scoop it all in and have the little clear pull off any extra hair while also keeping my broom in good condition and preventing bristles from curling. I also like that they attach so they stay neatly together. My only issue is that the parts screw off of each other very easily, so I am left with half a broom sometimes trying to clean lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great concept but made on the cheaper side.
reviews.reviewText: Works great and saves your back. Slim and compact for storage. A little on the flimsy side due to cheap plastic. Would be a 5star if sturdier but still a good set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as nice as picture on site
reviews.reviewText: I am having to return this. The dustbin handle would not stay on. The bristles on the broom were sparse and the whole thing cheaply made. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I like the dust pan but the broom is very flimsy and keeps coming apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice, lightweight broom and long handled dustpan set. Very cute!
reviews.reviewText: I will admit that I bought this for the lovely aqua blue color. It is an extremely cute set, and it fits in with my late grandmother's decor. It was her favorite color! That being said, it is a nice set for lightweight sweeping jobs inside the home rather than heavier jobs involving gravel or pebbles, etc. I would recommend a metal standing dustpan and a heavier quality broom for jobs like that. It's ideal for a disabled person such as myself. I had no trouble carrying it downstairs. The broom and the dustpan attach together and can be stored comfortably in most closets. I quite like the bent holder on the dustpan; it makes it comfortable and easy to grip. The broom has soft bristles and is perfect for indoor, lightweight jobs. The assembly directions--as some other reviewers have noted--are in very small print. I recommend a magnifying glass or good reading spectacles to see them clearly. One helpful hint is that the two 'C' pieces have dark ends on them. It helps to differentiate from the similar 'D' and 'F' pieces. Also, the curved handle is for the dustpan and the straight handle is for the broom. The broom handle was shipped on the wrong end of the 'F' handle, but I figured it out! I recommend this adorable product for basic household jobs. I'm very glad that I bought it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Stylish to say the least but that would be to actually say the most. This thing is beautiful but all the things that make a broom great are missing along with the dust pan. I saw good reviews and loved the aqua color that matches all my household things but every single time I try to use it, i hate myself for ordering this setup online. IT FALLS APART IN MY HAND!!!!! It’s not sturdy enough to stay together. I guess I could have possibly gotten a dud and maybe that’s why the broom handle doesn’t stay together. I get it’s lightweight but I’m literally just trying to clean up chip crumbs and the simplest of things. But wait folks there’s more… or less I should say. The dust pan does stay together and I actually Love the clip the broom hooked to it but the purpose of a dust pan is to pick up the dirt you sweep into it so you can throw it out. I was excited about the rubber lip part that looked like it would help pick up more dirt but for some reason it never gets close enough to the floor to not leave a huge mess under the dust pan when you move it away. I’ve tried pressing down more to try and solve this issue but nothing has worked. So after trying to keep my broom together in one hand, I’m having to extra sweep a hole debris line behind every dirt pile I make. It’s exhausting. So yeah. Cute to look at but does not work for me for some reason. Instead of making my life easier, it just makes cleaning more frustrating :/ hopefully just got a dud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, works as advertised, nice color
reviews.reviewText: I got this today, put it together in a jiffy, and then immediately started sweeping my leaf-cluttered lanai after long delays and excuses. In short, this dustpan-broom set made sweeping sort of fun! It certainly made it easier. The cap of plastic on the broom initially had a tendency to come off, so I struck it a few times with my mallet and that solved it. Works well: the dustpan sits open and stands up when you 'park' it, but it folds easily otherwise. The broom has flexible bristles. Good buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very bad quality and came broken
reviews.reviewText: Used and broken very very bad quality
